Ok, I'm remodeling my scenario #118 (aka "Archer Encampment") and
would appreciate any suggestions for improvements.  I've already added
some teleporters to (hopefully) allow the faeries to go from one
source of water to another to keep them from being confined.  Yea!! 
And adding more of those faeries, just because it feels right.

* * *

I'm getting ready to to add the thumbnail option to Jesse, just having
some trouble understanding the color values in colors.h .  I don't
quite  understand what the numbers really mean, I'm used to RGB format
for color numbers.

Oh yea, I gotta fix the scrollbars for the image so you can see the
entire pic at once (minor issue) and save the file.

If I can't figure it, I'll end up going through a color wheel to find
what I consider to be appropriate colors.
